javadoc:
Marks this model as one that is column-based, using {@link DynamicTableColumn}s.
@param <ROW_TYPE> the row type of the underlying table model

methods.name: getColumn
methods.comment: Returns the column for the given model index

params.name: index
params.comment: the model index of the column (this can differ from the view index)

methods.name: getColumnIndex
methods.comment: Returns the model index for the given column

name: DynamicColumnTableModel
comment: Marks this model as one that is column-based, using DynamicTableColumns.
